title: The Power that means progress, compressed air power
creator_credit: Colin Bell, James Carr and British Information Services
brief_description: How man uses compressed air power in various situations, from ligh to heavy use. Total information on developing the compressor equipment. Well filmed and edited and the information is well presented in a clear and understandable way.
